body.head: amarakośaḥ

lg.l: sevyatām akṣayo dhīrāḥ sa śriye cāmṛtāya ca || 1 ||

body.head: abhinavarājalakṣmīḥ
body.p:
yasyeti | he dhīrāḥ = vidvāṃsaḥ | ‘kṛtikṛṣṭyabhirūpadhīrāḥ’ iti nāma
mālā | akṣayaḥ = anādir anantaḥ, saḥ = bhanavān_ śivaḥ, sevyatām, ‘bhavadbhi’
r iti śeṣaḥ, yasya — agādhasya = anavacchinnamahimātiśayasya, [jñānañ ca dayā
ca — jñānadaye, jñānadayayoḥ sindhur iva sindhuḥ — tasya —] jñānadayāsindhoḥ = jñāna
sāgarasya, dayānidheś ca, anaghā = manoharāḥ, pavitrāś ca, kṣamāśāntyaiśvaryādayo —
guṇāḥ santi | kasmai prayojanāya sevyatām ity ata āha — śriye = kalyāṇāya,
trivargasukhāya, amṛtāya = mokṣāya ca | yad vā ― he anaghāḥ | bhavadbhiḥ sa
dhīrāḥ sevyatām | dhiyaṃ = jñānaṃ rāti = dadātīti dhīrāḥ = jñānapradaḥ, śivaḥ,
śriye = sakalasukhasampattaye, amṛtāya ca = mokṣāya ca | yad vā — ‘yasye’ty atra
‘iko yaṇ acī’ty anena kṛtayaṇādeśasya īkārasya praśleṣaḥ, (ī – asyeti praśleṣaḥ)
asya = śivasya, ī = lakṣmīḥ, anaghā = pavitrā guṇāś ca santi, ataḥ sa
prasanno bhagavāñ śivo yuṣmabhyaṃ bhogamokṣalakṣmīṃ kṛpayā dāsyatīti bhāvaḥ |
jñāyate 'nena jñānaṃ = śāstraṃ, dayā = nirupādhiḥ paraduḥkhahānecchā, tayoḥ sāgarasye
vāgādhasya, yataḥ kāruṇikāt_ sarvā vidyā prādurbhavantīty arthaḥ | kathambhūtaḥ sa —
akṣayaḥ = nityaśuddhabuddhasaccidānandarūpaḥ — ity arthaḥ — iti saṅ_kṣepaḥ || 1 ||
